channel.title: Tags on Miffi's Decadence

item.title: An Attempt at a Blog
item.description:
Hello there. welcome to my blog, my own little corner of the internet.I’ve got a couple of ideas as to what I’m going to write here, mostlylinux stuff: nvim config stuff in lua, messing around with xbpspackaging, runit, listing some steps to installing particularly stupidto install software (cough cough wine-wayland), etc. Though if any ofthis comes to fruition is to be seen.

I hope you find the stuff I’ll post here interesting, and thanks forstopping by!
